hero.one-liner: Full-stack solution provider for machine intelligence
hero.team: We are a team of robotics and AI enthusiasts, dedicated to research and development of cutting-edge machine intelligence tech.

about.summary: Ceres is commited to providing most advanced robotics solution to clients like robot manufacturers
about.line-1: Our team members are from world's top-ranking universities and have well-established knowledge in the industry
about.line-2: We focus on providing top-notched solution to help our clients' transformation towards automation and intelligence.

services.title: SERVICES
services.objectives: We are deeply committed to the growth and success of our clients.

service-1.title: Full Design
service-1.desc: A complete pipeline of robot development, including ID, MD, electronics, software and algorithm design and development, to build a product just for your need.

service-2.title: Customization
service-2.desc: Minor customization of our existing solutions to fit personalized requirement, e.g. ID, brand etc.

service-3.title: Algorithm & SW Customization
service-3.desc: We provide algorithm and software design and development, while our clients can focus on definition and design of the complete product

service-4.title: General AI Consultation
service-4.desc: We also provide professional consultation for clients' various requests on machine intelligence

build.title: We <1>Build</1>
build.desc: With more than 10 years of experience in robotics and artificial intelligence, we help to bring our customers' idea into reality a.s.a.p.

collaborate.title: We <1>Collaborate</1>
collaborate.desc: We collaborate with customer's tech team to integrate most advanced AI tech into existing business that increases efficiency and reduces costs

product-1.title: Robot Self-navigation Kit
product-1.desc: The kit includes main controller and relevant sensors, it also includes core algorithms like mapping, localization, perception, PnC, etc. Suitable for both indoor and outdoor usages.

product-2.title: Garden Robot Solution
product-2.desc: Compelete controller, sensor and actuator solution for robotic mower and snow robots, highly customizable based on clients' different needs.

product-3.title: Smart Management Platform
product-3.desc: All-in-one robot fleet management, asset management and multi-robot dispatching platform

product-4.title: Smart Sensors
product-4.desc: Cost-effective smart camera with on-device perception capabilities for different applications, supports various DL algorithms like classification, detection, segmentation etc.

partners.title: OUR PARTNERS
partners.desc: Some of our partners and clients

contact.question: Ready to revolutionize your business?
contact.answer: Link with us and let's build something amazing together!
